author: Special Correspondent
text:
In order to facilitate easy and speedy completion of road repair works being undertaken by the National Highways authorities at Katteri on the Mettupalayam – Coonoor ghat road, the officials have announced one-way traffic pattern on the ghat section till January 10.

Vehicles from Mettupalayam will be allowed to take the Burliar – Coonoor road.

On the return direction, vehicles from Udhagamandalam and Coonoor proceeding to Mettupalayam will have to take the Kotagiri road, especially during peak time from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m.
title: One-way traffic on ghat road
